subject: Problems with load cell.
description_text:
Hello,

On my Simsonn Pro X Ultra brake, the springs are fully compressed at ~49
kg. I can press harder, but force barely increases and the load goes into
the cockpit instead of the load cell.
[image: image.png]

Can you tell me what the problem might be?
Could you recommend the correct spring/elastomer setup to safely reach
higher brake force (around 100–120 kg) without bottoming out?

Thanks
Vladimir

conversations.body_text: Hi Vladimir Lunev,  Yesterday, you contacted us through our OZON platform support team, and I have already arranged to send you a replacement control box.
